Call for action?

Apr 5, 2011

Since issue #6 No Topic, MAŠTA is being followed by weird wibes and questions - if no action is an action too. If we assume that its all about information and the fact that amount of facts we have to filter with our brains is growing in rapid speed. Hopefully its not the famous geometrical progression, what in nature sygnalises about sickness. Or is it?

Just think a bit - what will happen if smb erases their Facebook account. No worries, You dont have to make that radical step - there is already "the Facebook Resistance" support group in Facebook. But who will notice, if You dont tweet for one day. Or if You just do nothing. Online.

There are multiple choices for not only consuming, but contributing to the Web. Now there are also some for using it without leaving obvious traces - here I mean pages like Zombocom, where visitors and makers gain ... nothing.

You can click this, but its on Your own risk: http://www.donothingfor2minutes.com/</wbr>

Publication made by the Mašta collective.

Inspired by the activities and experiences of the network, the Mašta collective has created the "Microevolutions - a practical guide to creative activism"
